name: Tyrannosaurus Tex
overview: TYRANNOSAURUS TEX sees you take control of Tex, a maverick cowboy from the little town of Eastwood. A new diamond mine has opened nearby, and Tex loves diamonds! But, as ever, things aren't quite what they seem.... Guide Tex through 28 massive 3D levels, collecting diamonds, shooting Robots and Dinosaurs, and rescuing the lost townsfolk. Watch as the story unfolds in stunning comic-book fashion with the aid of superb cut-scene pictures. Navigate Tex through complex mazes, help him dispatch devious enemies, and make sure he rescues the girl...
